name: Yogurt Mint Sauce
description: Lamb is easy to love on its own, but the pairing of a mint sauce against that rich, flavorful meat is a combo so ingrained in our collective palates, it's nearly impossible to resist.
recipeIngredient: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Place yogurt, mint, garlic, lemon juice, cumin, and cayenne in a small bowl and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Let sit for 30 minutes, then serve, or transfer to an airtight container and store in refrigerator for up to a week.
